<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Pacifying](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1870)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 78

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune turns weapons into instruments of peacemaking.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647))  **Trigger** You damage a creature with the etched weapon;  **Effect** The damaged creature must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or be pacified. A pacified creature takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls on any attacks that aren't [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) for 1 minute, and the creature also experiences a clear psychic warning that they should stop making attacks that could kill.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
